lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador of Spain won the first stage of the Paris-Nice race in pouring rain. Contador, who won the Tour of Algarve in Portugal last month, completed the 5.8-mile time trial around Amilly, France, seven seconds faster than Bradley Wiggins.
